## Properties

| Property     | Attribute  | Description                                    | Type                             | Default    |
| ------------ | ---------- | ---------------------------------------------- | -------------------------------- | ---------- |
| `isDisabled` | `disabled` | Specifies if disabled button. Default is false | `boolean`                        | `false`    |
| `size`       | `size`     | Specifies the default size of button           | `"LARGE" \| "MEDIUM" \| "SMALL"` | `'MEDIUM'` |
